Package game

Class Dirt

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
game.Dirt
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, GroundInterface
public class Dirt
extends Ground
A class that represents bare dirt and will help check if the dirt can produce a bush every turn.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Dirt()
    the constructor for the dirt class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void tick​(Location location)
    provides the passage of time on the dirt and checks if it is possible for the dirt to grow a bush in the turn, if the probability to grow is met then it will create and set a bush on the location this dirt is on.

    Methods inherited from class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground

    addCapability, allowableActions, blocksThrownObjects, canActorEnter, getDisplayChar, hasCapability, removeCapability

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    Methods inherited from interface edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.GroundInterface

    getFruits, removeFruit

    • Dirt

      the constructor for the dirt class

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick​(Location location)
      provides the passage of time on the dirt and checks if it is possible for the dirt to grow a bush in the turn, if the probability to grow is met then it will create and set a bush on the location this dirt is on.
      Overrides:
      tick in class Ground
      Parameters:
      location - The location of the dirt on the map
